name: @graphql-box/swc-plugin-gql
description: The GraphQL Box SWC plugin for replacing paths to GraphQL queries with those queries.
author: Dylan Aubrey

scripts.lint: rustup component add clippy && cargo clippy
scripts.prepack: rustup target add wasm32-wasi && cargo build --release -p swc-plugin-graphql-box-gql --target wasm32-wasi
